activity_differential: children moving toward a pavilion to join others
children socializing in a village square
description: A group of children and possibly adults are moving through an outdoor area with vehicles, buildings, and natural scenery. The camera follows the children as they run, walk, and interact, eventually approaching a pavilion where more people are gathered. The environment transitions from a parking area to a more open, social space.
